title: Star guardian
body: i did that star guardian quiz and i didnt get my icon :| what i do now? wait or what?

replies.body: Here is the direct link to the [Star Guardian Quiz](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/star-guardian-2016/quiz).  Just make sure you're logged into the intended account!
yeah i was pretty sure that i was logged in. This is the 4th day :v
oh there is a quizz ? I was watching worlds didn't see that on the lol client  what is the link plz ? ( btw sorry if ive done any mistakes im not english )
It will take a few days (usually up to 3) for the icon to unlock on the account.  Hang tight, the goodies will come!
